content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/elf-ornament-free-crochet-pattern/ the best part about this pattern is that you can choose any hair colour and any colour and style of hat to make a custom elf make an elf version of your friends or family or crochet the perfect hat to match your decor maybe you want to make a buddy the elf for a huge elf movie fan maybe there s a certain dentist elf that you need to add to your rudolph collection d or maybe a classic red and green elf is more your jam so many options final ornament measures approximately 12cm/5 tall
